long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for lazy redditors to find links in a thread, it crawls the whole page and create a table with the links sorted by upvotes (hopefully) below the post form. This is the first version, I hope to add (or fix) more things soon!
